appDescription.message: Shopping Assistant: Save Time by AI. Discover Price History, Avoid Costly Deals, Spot Fake Reviews, Spot Seller's Negative Rating.

btnTooltip.description: Feel confident when you shop online

anti_scam_dangerous_website.message: Safe-Deal has reviewed this website and determined that it could be dangerous {SafeVsUnsafePercentageAmount}!

anti_scam_confirm.message: High probability that this website is a scam, a thief, or some other illegal activity. You trust this website?

signal_of_a_good_deal.message: An indication of a good deal

signal_of_a_bad_deal.message: An indication of a questionable deal

no_data.message: Currently, there are no data to display

tour_step1_text_0.message: , Thank you for using our software.

tour_step1_text_1.message: Here is one of our supported shops.

tour_step1_text_2.message: Works the same way on other supported sites such as AliExpress, eBay, Amazon, and more.

tour_step1_text_3.message: It should take around a minute to explain how it works.

tour_step2_text_0.message: Making quick and efficient buying decisions is at the heart of our product; we act as a traffic light for online purchases.

tour_step2_text_3.message: Our Artificial Intelligence makes a data-driven decision on products in a few seconds. This way, you get a quick indicator on many products within minutes, not hours of manual checking.

tour_step3_text_0.message: You can shop wisely today to save hassle in the future.

tour_step5_text_0.message: Using our service is free for you. When you make a purchase, the store pays us a small fee for guiding you to the best product.

tour_step5_text_1.message: The software works locally since we care about your privacy. No information about your activity is collected.

tour_feedback_text.message: Get in touch if you have an idea, a problem, or if you need to discuss an improvement:

tooltip_product_feedback_safe.message: Many customers highly recommended the product

tooltip_product_feedback_un_safe.message: The product is not recommended enough by customers

tooltip_product_feedback_safe_rated.message: Reviews are extremely positive. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Reviews: {ProductReviewAmount}, Ratings: {ProductRatingAmount}

tooltip_product_feedback_un_safe_rated.message: Reviews deficiency or poor reviews. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Reviews: {ProductReviewAmount}, Ratings: {ProductRatingAmount}

tooltip_product_feedback_safe_orders.message: Reviews are extremely positive. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Orders: {ProductOrdersAmount}, Reviews: {ProductReviewAmount}

tooltip_product_feedback_un_safe_orders.message: Reviews deficiency or poor reviews. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Orders: {ProductOrdersAmount}, Reviews: {ProductReviewAmount}

tooltip_product_feedback_safe_orders_onl.message: Reviews are extremely positive. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Orders: {ProductOrdersAmount}

tooltip_product_feedback_un_safe_orders_.message: Reviews deficiency or poor reviews. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Orders: {ProductOrdersAmount}

tooltip_seller_feedback_safe_orders_only.message: The shop is highly rated. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Orders: {ProductOrdersAmount}

tooltip_seller_feedback_un_safe_orders_o.message: The shop is poorly rated. Stars: {ProductRatingValue}, Orders: {ProductOrdersAmount}

tooltip_order_safe.message: A large number of satisfied customers

tooltip_order_un_safe.message: A small number of happy customers

tooltip_rating_safe.message: Many satisfied customers have left reviews

tooltip_rating_un_safe.message: Many angry customers posted negative reviews

tooltip_delivery_safe.message: Excellent delivery time, {daysToDeliver} days at most

tooltip_delivery_un_safe.message: It can take up to {daysToDeliver} days to get your package.

tooltip_delivery_unknown.message: It is unclear when the delivery will take place

tooltip_seller_feedback_safe.message: The majority of the store's customers are satisfied, {percentOfPeople}%

tooltip_seller_feedback_un_safe.message: Many Customers are dissatisfied with the store, {percentOfPeople}%

tooltip_seller_feedback_unknown.message: The store lacks feedback from customers

tooltip_free_shipping_un_safe.message: Shipped for a fee or pickup required

tooltip_product_pricing_no_price_availab.message: A poor selection of buying options

tooltip_product_pricing_type_excellent.message: The price is excellent, {priceDifVsAverage}% lower compared to the average

tooltip_product_pricing_type_average_low.message: The price is fair, {priceDifVsAverage}% lower compared to the average

tooltip_product_pricing_type_average_hig.message: The price is fair, {priceDifVsAverage}% higher compared to the average

tooltip_product_pricing_type_expensive.message: An expensive price, {priceDifVsAverage}% higher compared to the average

tooltip_amazon_choice_safe.message: Amazon Choose - A reliable and good-value product

tooltip_amazon_sold_ship_safe.message: Amazon sells and ships this product

tooltip_amazon_sold_or_ship_safe.message: Sold or shipped by Amazon, third party involved

tooltip_walmart_sold_ship_safe.message: Walmart sells and ships this product

tooltip_review_meta_safe.message: Feedbacks looks great! {validAmount} authentic, {fakeAmount} unnatural, {totalAmount} total

tooltip_review_meta_un_safe.message: Feedbacks looks manipulated! {validAmount} authentic, {fakeAmount} unnatural, {totalAmount} total

tooltip_bsr_safe.message: This product is selling really well

tooltip_bsr_un_safe.message: Sales of the product are relatively low

popup_title.message: Your smart assistant for online shopping

popup_footer_share.message: Tell your friends and family about SafeDeal

popup_support_us_via_affiliate_link.message: Verified safe site. Support us via our affiliate link.

explanations_price_history.message: A product's price history graph - This can help you spot real discounts from fake ones. We keep a record of the price and then monitor changes on a daily basis, making it possible to take advantage of sales and limited-time offers.

explanations_review_and_ratings.message:
The conclusion is based on: 
    1) To derive an overall view of product recommendations, we applied various statistical analysis and artificial intelligence techniques. 
    2) Reviews and ratings were analyzed, and we consider a rating of 4 and above to be an indication of a great product. 
    3) A meaningful result requires at least 100 orders, so the more orders we analyze, the more we trust the product rating conclusion more.

explanations_store_age.message: Our system measures store credibility using the store's age, since stores with more experience and positive reputations are more credible.

explanations_store_rating.message: We check the overall store feedback score, the higher the score, the better the chances of getting a good service. Over 91% feedback is considered positive feedback.

explanations_top_seller_ali_express.message: AliExpress classifies the seller as a very reliable seller, with a high volume of sales

explanations_amazon_bsr.message: An Amazon bestseller is one that has at least 150 sales per month and the more sales it has, the easier it becomes to rely on other buyers' feedback.

explanations_amazon_choice.message: Products marked Amazon's Choice are frequently bought by customers. They have a favorable price, are highly rated, and are available for quick shipping from Amazon's warehouse.

explanations_amazon_review_meta.message: We use Statistical Modeling to position and adjust the number of positive reviews based on the number of unnatural reviews, so you can make your decision based on high-quality data. The algorithm is not perfect, but has high accuracy rates. Amazon has done a good job of gathering hundreds of millions of feedbacks, but many brands have chosen to abuse it, flooding it with low quality and biased reviews to try and boost their own profits.

explanations_amazon_sold_ship.message: Sold and Shipped by Amazon: These items were ordered as inventory by Amazon. They're being sold and shipped directly from an Amazon warehouse. You'll be able to get the item much faster, and Amazon will be handling any customer service issues directly.

explanations_amazon_sold_or_ship.message: These items are owned by an independent, third-party business and are shipped ahead of time to Amazon's warehouses. When you buy them, Amazon ships them to you.

explanations_ebay_delivery_time.message: It is important for buyers to know when they can expect an item to arrive. That's why we always check an estimated delivery date on eBay. The estimated delivery date is based on the time it takes the seller to pack and ship items, and the delivery time from postal services.We consider 14 days for domestic shipments and 30 days for international shipments as excellent delivery times.

explanations_ebay_free_shipping.message: Free shipping is a great indication that a seller will provide great customer service and ship the item on time as described.

explanations_ebay_return_policy_on.message: Accepting returns is a good indication of a good seller: If you receive an item that is damaged or incorrect, you can return it for a refund.

explanations_ebay_return_policy_off.message: Payable Returns or No Returns: Only if the product arrived incorrectly can you return it for a refund.

explanations_ebay_top_rated.message: Sellers who deliver excellent customer service on a large scale are branded by eBay with the Top Rated badge. This means they have a high feedback score and a high percentage of positive feedback on eBay, so it's safer to buy from them.

explanations_ebay_sold_by_brand.message: Sellers who represent a brand are often associated with excellent customer service. They usually have high feedback scores and a large percentage of positive feedback on eBay, which makes purchasing from them a safer option.

explanations_why_it_free.message: Why is Using Safe-Deal Free for You?

explanations_why_it_free_line_1.message: Using our service is free for you. When you make a purchase, the store pays us a small fee for guiding you to the best product.

explanations_why_it_free_line_2.message: We use publicly available data only, ensuring no brand or shop influences our recommendations.

premium_features_no_affiliation.message: No affiliation, you can plug any cashback program you want

premium_features_enhanced_support.message: Personal Phone and Email support & Enhanced processing time

explanations_why_it_free_additional_affi.message: The money collected is used to improve the service and pay for infrastructure.

extension_not_available.message: SafeDeal Extension is not available for this page.

search_for_any_other_keyword.message: Search for any other keyword to find coupons and deals.

click_to_reveal.message: Click or press {systemShortcut} to toggle between minimal and full analysis.

click_to_hide.message: Click on the icon or press the 'Escape' key to close the detailed view.

click_to_pin.message: Pin this panel to keep it visible on refresh and as you browse

click_to_unpin.message: Unpin this panel so it will hide when clicking elsewhere on the page

reviews_no_reviews_text.message: No customer reviews yet. This product may be new or not popular.

reviews_error.message: We apologize for the inconvenience. It seems that the review summarization process was unsuccessful. To resolve this issue, kindly contact the Safe Deal Support Team for assistance.

opinions_title.message: Share Your Insights or Offer Advice on This Product
